General.Name: Zim Laboratories Limited
General.Description: ZIM Laboratories Limited develops, manufactures, and supplies generic pharmaceutical and nutraceutical products in India and internationally. The company provides its products in pre- formulation intermediates and finished formulations using modified release patterns in the oral solid dosage forms, such as granules, pellets, taste-masked powders, suspensions, tablets, capsules, dry syrup, and oral thin films. It offers therapeutics in the areas of urology, gastroenterology, CNS, antibiotics, anti-infectives, NSAIDs/pain analgesics, and vitamins and supplements. ZIM Laboratories Limited was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Nagpur, India.
